channel.title: DRC on SUPER-Lab
channel.description: Recent content in DRC on SUPER-Lab

item.title: Demonstration of GaN Impact Ionization Avalanche Transit-Time (IMPATT) Diode
item.description: The following topics are dealt with: III-V semiconductors; wide band gap semiconductors; gallium compounds; random-access storage; field effect transistors; semiconductor growth; aluminium compounds; indium compounds; semiconductor device breakdown; hafnium compounds.
